content: simple packer and harness by deadhawke worsted weight 3 5mm hook notes before you begin i designed these for my crocheting which i readily admit is very tight i used worsted weight weight 4 acrylic yarn and a 3 5 mm crochet hook you may need to use a lighter weight yarn like sock yarn and a smaller hook to match my stitching the goal is that the penis should be just about 3 5 inches long head included when it is done this makes a packer that is just on the smaller side but is the average size of a flaccid penis and gives a noticeable bulge without looking like an erection also i am using us crochet terms in this pattern at the end of each row in the i include what your current stitch count after completing the row should be abbreviations st stitch chain chain ea - each single_crochet - single_crochet single_crochet increase - single_crochet increase do 2 single crochets into the same stitch single_crochet 2 decrease - single_crochet two stitches together i personally do this through front loops only also called a single_crochet decrease half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet tc - triple crochet penis worked in the round in a spiral 1 magic_ring 6 single_crochet 6 2 single_crochet increase in ea st around 12 3 *single_crochet increase single_crochet* repeat * 6 times 18 4 *single_crochet increase 5 single_crochet* repeat * 3 times 21 5 single_crochet in ea st around 21 6 single_crochet in back loops only in ea st around 21 7 *single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet* repeat * 5 times single_crochet in remaining 16 8-22 single_crochet in ea st around 16 finish off leaving a 12 long tail for sewing later testicles worked in the round in a spiral 1 chain 16 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet 13 3 single_crochet in last chain 13 single_crochet in back of chain 2 single_crochet in last chain 32 2-3 single_crochet in ea st around 32 optl add stitch marker at st 17 to help keep track 4 single_crochet 7 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 14 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 7 30 5 single_crochet in ea st around 30 6 single_crochet 7 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 13 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 6 28 7 single_crochet in ea st around 26 8 single_crochet 6 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 12 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 6 26 9 single_crochet in ea st around 10 single_crochet 6 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 11 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 5 24 11 single_crochet in ea st around 12 single_crochet 5 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 10 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 5 22 13 single_crochet in ea st around 14 single_crochet 5 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 9 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 4 20 15 single_crochet 4 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 8 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 4 18 16 single_crochet 4 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 7 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 3 16 finish off you can simply tuck yarn ends into pouch internal balls optional make 2
